src:
Tovornjak na avtocesti trčil v stoječ avto
Oba voznika sta jo odnesla z lažjimi poškodbami.
05 Nov 2019, 08:54 by A. L.
LOPATA – Včeraj okoli 17. ure se je na avtocesti v bližini počivališča Lopata zgodila nesreča, zaradi katere je bila avtocesta v smeri Maribora dobrih šest ur zaprta. V policijskem poročilu PU Celje piše, da je do prometne nesreče prišlo, ko je 31-letna voznica osebnega vozila zaradi predrte pnevmatike zapeljala na odstavni pas, tam pa je v njeno vozilo trčil 37-letni voznik tovornega vozila s priklopnikom.Tovorno vozilo se je prevrnilo in obstalo obrnjeno na boku čez celotno cestišče. Oba voznika sta se v trčenju lažje poškodovala.
text:
A truck on the highway collided with a standing car
Both drivers carried her away with minor injuries.
05 Nov 2019, 08:54 by A.L.
LOPATA - An accident occurred yesterday around 5pm on the highway near the Lopata resting place, causing the highway to be closed in Maribor for a good six hours. A police report from the Celje Police Department says that the car accident occurred when a 31-year-old passenger of a car drove into a lane due to a punctured tire, and a 37-year-old driver of a lorry with a trailer collided with her vehicle. rolled over and stayed sideways across the entire roadway. Both drivers were easily injured in the collision.
